facilities.description:
There are no parking facilities available at the building. However, paid off site parking is available adjacent to the building at Sandyford Square Car Park - NE1 8PP
Public transport is available to the building - a bus station is just outside, andit is within walking distance of Haymarket Metro station.
facilities.name: No parking

facilities.description: The public entrance is accessiblevia a disabled accessramp. All other public floors are accessible by lifts.
facilities.name: Disabled access

facilities.description: Loop Neck hearing enhancement facilities areavailable in all Hearing Rooms.
facilities.name: Hearing Loop

facilities.description: This building has hearing enchancement facilities that work by setting hearing aids to the 'T' setting. These are in all Hearing Rooms.
facilities.name: Hearing Loop

facilities.description: For safety and security, all users and their possessions will be searched by security when they enter this building. We have a security arch. Please alert the security officer if you have a pacemaker.
facilities.name: Security arch

facilities.description: Lifts are available in the building to access all public floors. The doors are 90cm wide and have a weight limit of 630kg.
facilities.name: Lift

facilities.description: There are public toilets on all floors.
facilities.name: Public toilets

facilities.description: Disabled toilets are available on each floor.
facilities.name: Disabled toilet

facilities.description: Water dispensers are available to the public on all floors.
facilities.name: Refreshments

facilities.description: Thirty interview rooms spread out across all floors. They cannot be booked in advance and are available on a first come first serve basis.
facilities.name: Interview room

facilities.description: A separate waiting room is available for those who have had to bring children with them. Children must be supervised at all times.
facilities.name: Children's waiting room

facilities.description: Court/hearing room video conferencing facilities and prison to court video link facilities are available (by prior arrangement)
facilities.name: Video facilities

facilities.description: Gov Wi-Fi is available throughout the building.Personal passwords are provided when one signsup to it.
facilities.name: Wireless network connection

facilities.description: Support Through Court is available on site to provide assistance.
facilities.name: Witness service
